title: Champion
description: The Connondale Explore was the brands first gravel bike released in 2016 when the gravel industry started to hit off.

title: Peloton
description: Today, their range consists of high-end road and gravel bikes. Kona Bikes is also a well-known sponsor in the cycling scene.

title: Master Wheels
description: The Denver based American brand pride themselves on building quality carbon and titanium framed bikes, and have won awards for their workmanship.

title: Velo Transit
description: You may not have heard of them due to their limited quantity runs of bikes, but if you’re after a handmade American bicycle.

title: Magic Bikes
description: An iconic bike brand with a specific niché orientated set of bikes on its range.It was their main mission when they started in 2008.

title: Mountain Ranger
description: Cervelo bikes specializes in on-road riding only, hence the reason you’ll find a fine selection of Road, Gravel, Cyclocross, and Hybrid bikes.

title: Naughty Bike
description: Something that sets them apart from other brands is the fact that most of the bikes’ frames are generally made of steel.

title: Hunter Bike
description: All of their bikes have a little twist to their design, while the whole build is designed for intermediate to advanced users.

title: Buddy Cycle
description: Orbea road bikes have a racing pedigree, with multiple Grand Tour wins under their belts including the most recent edition of Buddy Cycle.

title: Happy Star
description: Cannondale is one of the most popular bicycle brands in the world. A relatively young brand, it was founded in 1971 in Connecticut, USA.

title: Ridge Back
description: Their range consists of well-engineer folding, and electric folding bikes with rich history and attention to detail.

title: Ridge Back
description: They are known for their pioneering manufacturing, such as being one of the first brands to produce carbon fiber road bikes.

title: Rollin
description: They are well regarded for building beautiful road bikes but they have more recently ventured into gravel and e-bikes.

title: Urban Rider
description: They are focused on making affordable entry-level and mid-range bikes. Their affordability and no-nonsense branding make them a cult favorite.
